title: Create GAMING PLATFORM-features-racing-game Relationship
description:
* The relationship ›features-racing-game‹ is created when the provided IDs of the GAMING PLATFORM and RACING GAME are valid. -> Status Code \`201\`
* A successful request returns the ID of the created relationship, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* The same ›features-racing-game‹ relationship between the same nodes can only be created once. Attempts to recreate them will be ignored. -> Status Code \`304\`
* Each GAMING PLATFORM can be in a ›features-racing-game‹ relationship with multiple RACING GAMES
